title: Episode #24 "House Arrest"
description:
Guest Louie Lombardi (Agent Skip Lipari) joins Michael and Steve for this week’s amazing episode of Talking Sopranos. This is truly a family affair as Louie talks about growing up with Vinny Pastore, and how they both ended up on the same incredible show, playing opposite each other! He also knew Frank Pellegrino from the neighborhood who ended up playing his boss on the Sopranos. How crazy is that? 

Then Michael and Steve break down another fantastic episode of TV’s greatest series. Tony is getting it from all sides as everything is starting to build up to the season two finale…Don’t miss Talking Sopranos Ep #24 “House Arrest”. Subscribe to the Talking Sopranos podcast wherever you get your podcasts and please give us a good rating. Get your official Talking Sopranos merchandise and submit questions to Michael and Steve at talking sopranos.com.
author: talkingsopranos@gmail.com (Michael Imperioli, Steve Schirripa, Louis Lombardi)
